title: Planet

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Blot out the moon at night.
- Obscure one player's vision at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Blotting out the moon will cause all non-Rock players to, without their knowledge, visit a random non-Rock player.
- Obscuring one player's vision will cause them to visit a player at random without knowing, or fail to act if they are a killer.
- You may blot out the moon once during the game.

desc:
Post 253
*All of them...hunger to see. What happens when you crush that hope?*
